notes.cbor_payload_parse: Deserialize CBOR attestation payload (~1KB with certificate field)
notes.cert_chain_verify: Walk 3-cert chain (root→intermediate→leaf), verify each signature with issuer pubkey
notes.cose_signature_verify: Parse COSE_Sign1 + extract leaf cert from payload + coset verify_signature() + ecdsa_raw_to_der + ECDSA-P384-SHA384 verify
notes.curve_note: AWS Nitro root CA uses P-384 (secp384r1). Test chain uses identical curve and key sizes.
notes.full_verification: All three steps combined (COSE verify + chain walk + payload parse)
notes.signature_format: Raw (r||s) matching NSM output, converted to DER for OpenSSL verification
